npcSpeech.text: Listen, I don't know what you're up to but the sooner you leave the happier I'll be. See that circle on the right? It will transport you onward.
There are no sides... not anymore.
Wow... you really don't know. I can't help you now. Sorry. Keep going. Now! Hurry!!!

response.text: I really don't know what is happening.

npcSpeech.text: You've overstayed your welcome. Now go.
